attributes.action: Give the right for drivers to automatically have C1 and D1 categories on licences after having a licence for 2 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As someone who has been limited from many jobs by not having a C1 licence, I ask that this right (and D1)is restored to drivers who have had a licence for 2 or more years.
